languages.text: "Убогому слепцу ничто не ведомо... но Он знает все". {n}Узловатый палец указывает на величественную статую.{/n} "Он открывает недостойному истину в гаданиях, предупреждает его. А ткачи, танцующие на нитях, помогают жалкому старику расшифровать его знамения".

"This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."
languages.original_text: "Убогому слепцу ничто не ведомо... но Он знает все". {n}Узловатый палец указывает на величественную статую.{/n} "Он открывает недостойному истину в гаданиях, предупреждает его. А ткачи, танцующие на нитях, помогают жалкому старику расшифровать его знамения".

traits.locale_text: "The wretched blind man knows nothing... But He knows everything." {n}A knotted finger points at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to the unworthy, warns him through divinations... And the weavers that dance on the threads help the old man with interpreting his visions."

"The wretched blind man knows nothing... But He knows everything." {n}A knotted finger points at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to the unworthy, warns him through divinations... And the weavers that dance on the threads help the old man with interpreting his visions."

"The wretched blind man knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}A knotted finger points at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to the unworthy man, warns him through divinations... And then, the weavers who dance upon the threads help the old man to interpret his visions."

"The wretched blind man knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}A knotted finger points at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to the unworthy man, warns him through divinations... And then, the weavers who dance upon the threads help the old man to interpret his visions."

"This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."

"This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."

languages.text: «El hombre ciego y retorcido que tiene delante no sabe nada... pero Él lo sabe todo». {n}Señala con un dedo agarrotado a la majestuosa estatua.{/n} «Revela la verdad a esta mota insignificante, le advierte mediante adivinación... y los tejedores que bailan en sus hilos le ayudan a captar las visiones».
languages.original_text: "This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."

traits.locale_text: «El hombre ciego y retorcido que tiene delante no sabe nada... pero Él lo sabe todo». {n}Señala con un dedo agarrotado a la majestuosa estatua.{/n} «Revela la verdad a esta mota insignificante, le advierte mediante adivinación... y los tejedores que bailan en sus hilos le ayudan a captar las visiones».

languages.text: 「盲目で惨めなこの男は何も知らないが…すべてを知っている」{n}男は、堂々とした像をでこぼこの指で差す。{/n}「彼はこの無価値なシミに真実を教え、ディビネーションを通して警告した…そして、糸の上で踊る紡績工が力を貸し、ビジョンを見ることができたのだ」
languages.original_text: "This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."

traits.locale_text: 「盲目で惨めなこの男は何も知らないが…すべてを知っている」{n}男は、堂々とした像をでこぼこの指で差す。{/n}「彼はこの無価値なシミに真実を教え、ディビネーションを通して警告した…そして、糸の上で踊るウィーヴァーが力を貸し、ビジョンを見ることができたのだ」

languages.text: “这个瞎了眼的可怜人一无所知……但祂却无所不知。”{n}他伸出了骨节突出的手指，指着面容庄严的雕像。{/n}“祂将真理带给了这个卑微之人，以占卜的方式带来了警告……而那些在丝线上跳舞的织网者看到了预言的景象。”
languages.original_text: "This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."

traits.locale_text: “这个瞎了眼的可怜人一无所知……但祂却无所不知。”{n}他伸出了骨节突出的手指，指着面容庄严的雕像。{/n}“祂将真理带给了这个卑微之人，以占卜的方式带来了警告……而那些在丝线上跳舞的织网者看到了预言的景象。”

languages.text: "Dieser Mann, blind und elend, weiß nichts ... "Aber Er weiß alles." {n}Er deutet mit einem knorrigen Finger auf die majestätische Statue.{/n} "Er offenbart diesem unwürdigen Wurm die Wahrheit, warnt ihn durch Prophetie ... Und die Spinner, die auf den Fäden tanzen, helfen ihm, die Visionen zu begreifen."
languages.original_text: "This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Mann, blind und elend, weiß nichts ... "Aber Er weiß alles." {n}Er deutet mit einem knorrigen Finger auf die majestätische Statue.{/n} "Er offenbart diesem unwürdigen Wurm die Wahrheit, warnt ihn durch Prophetie ... Und die Spinner, die auf den Fäden tanzen, helfen ihm, die Visionen zu begreifen."

languages.text: « Cet homme, aveugle et misérable, ne sait rien... Mais Il sait tout. » {n}Il désigne d'un doigt noueux la statue majestueuse.{/n} « Il révèle la vérité à l'indigne sous vos yeux et l'avertit par des divinations... que les tisseurs qui dansent sur les fils l'aident à comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."

traits.locale_text: « Cet homme, aveugle et misérable, ne sait rien... Mais Il sait tout. » {n}Il désigne d'un doigt noueux la statue majestueuse.{/n} « Il révèle la vérité à l'indigne sous vos yeux et l'avertit par des divinations... que les tisseurs qui dansent sur les fils l'aident à comprendre. »

languages.text: "Kör ve perişan bu adam, hiçbir şey bilmez... Ancak O, her şeyi bilir." {n}Heybetli heykelin boğumlu parmağını işaret ediyor.{/n} "O ki bu kıymetsiz toz zerresine hakikati gösterir, onu kehanetlerle uyarır... İplikler üzerinde dans eden dokurlar ise onun görüleri kavramasına yardımcı olurlar."
languages.original_text: "This man, blind and wretched, knows nothing... But He knows all." {n}He points a knotted finger at the majestic statue.{/n} "He reveals the truth to this unworthy speck, warns him through divinations... And the spinners who dance upon the threads help him grasp the visions."
